label: Xbox.com
content:
My first job at Razorfish was to run the maintenance and authoring of Xbox's primary .com platform. Under my tenure as lead, we launched a number of campaign landing experiences, re-architectured how Xbox managed their online assets, and built and launched the entirety of the Xbox One's campaign and main landing pages for the November launch.

My contributions to this account won me the MVP award in the Razorfish Seattle office and I was credited with "saving the account" due to the difficulty of both the deadlines and the client.
